Dad's A Growth Hacker

He's practicioner of Zen And The Art of Getting Your Shit Done to inspire and empower people to change the world - while building kickass companies, products, and websites.

Wheelhouse

Believe - And You're Halfway There

Dad approaches all things with an open mind. He is pretty laid-back and yet extremely focused on getting (important) things done. He helps others do this, too, and is a core reason his methods are so successful.

Experiments in Technology

Whether it's stable, cutting edge or experimental - Dad's constantly reading about, learning, contributing to, and implementing the most future-proof technologies. #EncryptAllTheThings

Scalability - From Idea To The Moon

From data love to modern scaffolding tools to design thinking, Dad builds ideas into movements, products and companies that scale to the needs of now, and into the future.

Testing & Validation

From companies to products to campaigns, knowing your audience is the first and most important step to any sustainable traction. Test. Endlessly. Forever. is what Dad always says.

Projects

WriteOn

Write. Publish. Period.

WriteOn is a passion project built by Beard & Fedora. It's a clean, minimalistic writing tool built for authors by authors. It may just be the world's finest writing experience.

What are waiting for...Get started, write away (it's free!).

Sign Up For Private Beta

Beard & Fedora

Idea Makers - Story Tellers - Life Experiencers

A few years ago, in a detached garage in Downtown St. Pete, a business partnership came to fruition between two best friends. Since then, Tyler & Dad (Beard & Fedora) have built a startup accelerator for misfits, a LeanUX toolset, a distributed software development team, a full front end development stack, WriteOn, and more. They travel together, write together, and build things to inspire people to change the world together.

Check 'Em Out

Livit

Livit is where Dad builds ambitious, innovative and globally successful technology companies. It's an environment, online and offline, where he can share his passions, visions, goals, life lessons and artistic impulses with other like minded world changers.
